I am a senior university lecturer in _physiological plant ecology_ and principal investigator at the [Organismal and Evolutionary Biology Research Programme (OEB)](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/faculty-biological-and-environmental-sciences/research/organismal-and-evolutionary-biology), [Faculty of Biological and Environmental Sciences](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/faculty-biological-and-environmental-sciences) of the [University of Helsinki](https://www.helsinki.fi/en) and member of the [Viikki Plant Science Center (ViPS)](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/researchgroups/viikki-plant-science-centre).

I am the leader of the research group [Sensory and Physiological Ecology of Plants (SenPEP)](https://blogs.helsinki.fi/senpep-blog).
